00018     public partial class TripForm : UIForm

00020         private ServiceManager service = null;
00021         private TripMode mode;
00022         Trip trip = null;

00025         public TripForm(TripMode mode, Trip trip)
00026         {
00027             InitializeComponent();
00028             this.mode = mode;
00029             this.trip = trip;
00030             defaultFrequency = MobileConfiguration.DefaultSendFrequency;
00031 
00032             service = new ServiceManager();
00033             nudFrequency.Value = defaultFrequency;
00034         }

00036         private void FormLoad(object sender, EventArgs e)
00037         {
00038             this.MenuBar.LeftMenu = "Back";
00039             this.MenuBar.LeftMenuClicked += new EventHandler(BackButtonClick);
00040             this.labelTripName.Text = trip.TripName;
00041             service.OnLocationSend += new Action(OnLocationSendToService);
00042         }
00043 
00044         private void OnLocationSendToService()
00045         {
00046             if (InvokeRequired)
00047             {
00048                 Invoke(new Action(OnLocationSendToService));
00049                 return;
00050             }
00051             bttnAddPoint.Enabled = true;
00052             picBoxSignal.Visible = true;
00053             Thread thread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(TimerMethod));
00054             thread.Start();
00055         }
00056 
00057         private void TimerMethod()
00058         {
00059             if (InvokeRequired)
00060             {
00061                 Invoke(new Action(TimerMethod));
00062                 return;
00063             }
00064             Thread.Sleep(500);
00065             picBoxSignal.Visible = false;
00066         }
00067 
00068         private void BackButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00069         {
00070             if (service.IsTripRunning)
00071                 StopButtonClick(this, EventArgs.Empty);
00072 
00073             this.DialogResult = DialogResult.Cancel;
00074             this.Close();
00075         }
00076 
00077         private void StartButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00078         {
00079             service.SendFrequencyInSeconds = (int)nudFrequency.Value;
00080             if (TripMode.NEW.Equals(mode))
00081             {
00082                 int tripId = service.RunNewTrip(trip.TripName);
00083                 trip.ID = tripId;
00084             }
00085             else
00086                 service.ContinueTrip(trip);
00087             setButtons(true);
00088         }
00089 
00090         private void StopButtonClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00091         {
00092             service.StopTrip();
00093             mode = TripMode.CONTINUE;
00094             setButtons(false);
00095         }
00096 
00097         private void setButtons(bool start)
00098         {
00099             bttnStart.Enabled = !start;
00100             nudFrequency.Enabled = !start;
00101             bttnAddPoint.Visible = start;
00102             bttnStop.Enabled = start;
00103         }
00104 
00105         private void AddInterestingSpotClick(object sender, EventArgs e)
00106         {
00107             PointForm pointForm = new PointForm();
00108             DialogResult result = pointForm.ShowDialog();
00109 
00110             PositionNode lastNode = service.LastPositionNode;
00111             string description = pointForm.Description;
00112             if (result == DialogResult.OK && lastNode != null && description != string.Empty)
00113             {
00114                 service.UpdatePositionNode(lastNode.TripID, lastNode.OrdinalNumber, description); 
00115                 bttnAddPoint.Enabled = false;
00116             }
00117         }
00118     }
